entry.title: $2549 // Great location, just one block from the Carl Schurz Park!
entry.content:
516 E 88th St.
1A
Web: www.aimconyc.com | Phone: 646-758-0347

1 Bed / 1 Bath
Available Now!
Rent: 2549.05

Beautifully renovated one bedroom duplex!! Awesome apartment with all new kitchen and bath. The apartment is two levels, main floor features an all new separate kitchen, bathroom and a small living space. The lower level features a HUGE bedroom space with an extra large walk in closet! NO FEE apartment in a laundry building on quiet and charming East 88th Street in Yorkville, one block from the Carl Schurz Park and amazing jogging trails along the river!

*PRICE SHOWN IS THE NET EFFECTIVE RENT WITH 1 MONTH FREE ON AN 18 MONTH LEASE*

Owner managed and pet friendly (up to 35 lbs). Contact us for a tour!
U.S. guarantors accepted.

Price and availability are subject to change.
Equal Housing Opportunity
Professionally Managed by OP Property Management, LLC
